title: Holiday Hell
description:
Merry Christmas, adings! Today's episode is all about this magical and hellish time of year. First, Sapphire shares a cautionary tale about a popular toy. Then, she tells the story of a young girl's perfect Christmas, an encounter another girl had with Santa, and reveals a family's long hidden secret.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
